keyMoments.title: Perfect Clima-Tact Thunderbolt Tempo Debut
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her upgraded Perfect Clima-Tact in battle for the first time, unleashing Thunderbolt Tempo which proves too powerful to control, hitting both enemies and allies.
keyMoments.significance: First combat use of the Perfect Clima-Tact demonstrates its devastating power but reveals Nami needs to master controlling Usopp's overpowered design.

abilities.description: Nami creates a thundercloud using the Perfect Clima-Tact and unleashes powerful lightning bolts. The upgraded weapon's power is uncontrolled, striking everything in range.

reveals.information: First use of Perfect Clima-Tact in actual combat reveals its overwhelming power and lack of control

keyMoments.title: Paulie Leads Galley-La Against Watchdog Unit
keyMoments.description: Paulie arrives riding Sodom and leads the Galley-La foremen in battle against the Watchdog Unit of the Law, delivering the message 'You're fired' to be relayed to CP9.
keyMoments.significance: Paulie settles the score with CP9 for their betrayal and enables the Straw Hats to advance toward the courthouse.

keyMoments.title: Spandam Reveals Aokiji's Involvement
keyMoments.description: Spandam reveals that Admiral Aokiji informed him of Robin's arrival in Water 7 and gave him the authority to summon a Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the extent of Spandam's connections and planning, showing Aokiji's direct role in Robin's capture and the threat of the Buster Call.
keyMoments.quote: Admiral Aokiji informed me that Nico Robin was on her way to Water 7, and he entrusted me with the Buster Call!

keyMoments.title: Spandam Explains Deal Loophole
keyMoments.description: Spandam reveals how he exploited the loophole in his deal with Robin - since the crew left Water 7 to reach Enies Lobby, they technically departed in peace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Spandam's manipulative nature and undermines Robin's sacrifice to protect her crew.
keyMoments.quote: The agreement stated your crew, minus Robin, shall depart from Water 7 in peace. They left Water 7... so the deal is complete!

reveals.information: Received information about Robin from Admiral Aokiji
Possesses authority to summon a Buster Call via Golden Den Den Mushi given by Aokiji
Exploited loophole in deal with Robin by specifying departure from Water 7 specifically

keyMoments.title: Watchdog Unit Confronts Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Baskerville leads the Watchdog Unit of the Law in intercepting the Straw Hat Pirates, using war dogs and arm blades to attack.
keyMoments.significance: First major appearance of the elite Watchdog Unit defending Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Galley-La Foremen
keyMoments.description: Despite the Watchdog Unit's elite status and arrogance, Baskerville and his unit are overpowered by Paulie, Tilestone, and Peepley Lulu.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the combat prowess of the Galley-La foremen.

abilities.description: Baskerville wields long, thin blades attached to both wrists for slashing and stabbing attacks.

reveals.information: Leader of the elite Watchdog Unit of the Law at Enies Lobby

keyMoments.title: Luffy Fights Thousands of Marines Alone
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles thousands of Marines simultaneously while cornered on a cliff, demonstrating his determination to rescue Robin against overwhelming odds.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's unwavering resolve and combat prowess even when fighting alone deep in enemy territory.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Runs on Falling Marines
keyMoments.description: When the cliff collapses, Luffy creatively uses falling Marines as stepping stones to run upward and escape the collapse.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's resourcefulness and ability to turn dire situations to his advantage.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Blueno
keyMoments.description: Blueno appears through an Air Door to confront Luffy at the courthouse, setting up their upcoming battle.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's first direct confrontation with a CP9 agent at Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.quote: I'll get Robin out safely, no matter what!

keyMoments.title: Learns of Aokiji's Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers that Admiral Aokiji informed Spandam of her location and gave him the Buster Call authority, shocking her deeply.
keyMoments.significance: Shatters any hope Robin had that Aokiji might be different from other World Government agents, deepening her despair.

keyMoments.title: Realizes Her Sacrifice Was Meaningless
keyMoments.description: Robin learns that Spandam exploited a loophole in their deal, meaning her sacrifice to protect the crew accomplished nothing.
keyMoments.significance: Further reinforces Robin's hopeless situation and Spandam's cruel manipulation.

keyMoments.title: Appears to Confront Luffy
keyMoments.description: Blueno emerges through an Air Door created by his Doa Doa no Mi powers to face Luffy at the courthouse.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the first major CP9 vs Straw Hat one-on-one battle at Enies Lobby.
